name: Capture the Flag
summary: MS-DOS game released in 1992 by Richard Carr. First game to use the principle of "Capture The Flag." It is a strategy game, where two teams try to capture the other's flag before the other team captures theirs. The game takes place on a large field, with various types of terrain. You control one of the teams; the other team can be either controlled by the computer, or by another human player.
